did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Darryl Ricardo Matthews Sr. Papers, ca. 1990-2009.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Papers include Alpha Phi Alpha and National Association of Black Accountants material.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Darryl R. Matthews, Sr., graduated from the University of Central Missouri (1975-1977) with a degree in Sociology/Political Science. He was the Executive Director & Chief Operating Officer of the National Association of Black Accountants (NABA) from March 1998 - March 2007, the 32nd General President of Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity from January 2005 - December 2008, the Executive Director of the National Medical Association (NMA) from October 2011 - January 2014, and the Executive Director of the NABA from January 2014 - October 2015.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Papers include Alpha Phi Alpha and National Association of Black Accountants material.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Folder 60 in Box 6 is restricted until 2067 or permission of University Archivist.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Darryl Ricardo Matthews Sr. Papers, #8542. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
